sentence.Network_cn: 他的日记遭到了恶意毁坏。

sentence.Network_en: They openly and wantonly carried out repeated armed intrusions into our country.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们明目张胆地对我国不断发动武装入侵.

sentence.Network_en: The invaders wantonly set fire to Yuan Ming Yuan.
sentence.Network_cn: 侵略者恣意妄为,把圆明园付之一炬.

list.abs: destroy wantonly , as through acts of vandalism ., 通过故意行动放纵破坏.
The treaty wantonly violated and trampled on the sovereignty of China ., 这一规定是对中国主权的严重侵犯和践踏.
It can wantonly regulate the front - door opening height with the extremely convenient operation ., 前门开启高度任意调节 , 操作十分方便.
they wantonly interfere in the internal affairs of other countries .他们粗暴地干涉别国的内政。

entry.tran: 有意伤害的;肆无忌惮的；恶意的
entry.def: A wanton action deliberately causes harm, damage, or waste without having any reason to.

example.ex: ...this unnecessary and wanton destruction of our environment...
example.tran: 对我们环境毫无必要的肆意破坏

example.ex: Wanton violence is now becoming a regular feature of urban life.
example.tran: 肆无忌惮的暴行在城市生活中越来越司空见惯。

entry.def: If someone describes a woman as wanton, they disapprove of her because she clearly enjoys sex or has sex with a lot of men.

example.ex: ...the idea that only wanton women have sexual passions.
example.tran: 认为只有放荡女人才有性激情的观念

sentences.sentence: "the animals were killed wantonly for sport"

means.word_mean: 2. in a licentious and promiscuous manner;

sentences.sentence: "this young girl has to share a room with her mother who lives promiscuously"
